Package uk.ac.ed.inf.heatmap

Class FeatureGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ed.inf.heatmap.FeatureGenerator
  • public class FeatureGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    This is class is used to generate the features that are used in GeoMapper. It contains private methods that are used as tools for aiding the creation of such features. It also contains a function that is used for actually creating a feature.
    Author:
    Marios Katalanos

    • Constructor Detail

      • FeatureGenerator

        FeatureGenerator​(com.mapbox.geojson.Point[][] vertices,
                 int[][] data)
        Constructor for FeatureGenerator
        Parameters:
        vertices - A 2x2 matrix which contains points which could become vertices. Has dimensions from Settings.java increased by one to account for the outer right and bottom edges.
        data - A 2x2 matrix with dimensions from Settings.java which contains the data to be visualised.

    • Method Detail

      • colorFromData

        private java.lang.String colorFromData​(int x)
        This method maps a value to a color. If a value does not map to anything black is used.
        Parameters:
        x - The value to be mapped
        Returns:
        A string that contains the color in the form '#rrggbb'

      • generateLine

        private java.util.List<com.mapbox.geojson.Point> generateLine​(int lng,
                                                              int lat,
                                                              int side)
        Creates a list that contains two points that form a line.
        Parameters:
        lng - Longitude index that corresponds to a longitude index from the data matrix
        lat - Latitude index that corresponds to a latitude index from the data matrix
        side - 0,1,2,3,4 According to which side of the rectangle you wish to create starting from TOP being 0 going clockwise.
        Returns:
        A list of points that form a line with length 2.

      • generatePolygon

        private com.mapbox.geojson.Polygon generatePolygon​(int lng,
                                                   int lat)
        Create a polygon at the given location. Note the given indexes should not be at the outer edge of the vertices matrix.
        Parameters:
        lng - Longitude index from the vertices matrix which points to the top left corner of the polygon.
        lat - Latitude index from the vertices matrix which points to the top left corner of the polygon.
        Returns:
        A Polygon object with 4 sides with it's top left corner being at the Point pointed from vertices[lat][lng].

      • generateFeature

        protected com.mapbox.geojson.Feature generateFeature​(int lng,
                                                     int lat)
        Creates a complete feature object composed of: A polygon with vertices found from the vertices matrix, a color found using the data matrix.
        Parameters:
        lng - Longitude index pointing to the top left corner of the polygon to be formed. It's also used to find the color.
        lat - Latitude index pointing to the top left corner of the polygon to be formed. It's also used to find the color.
        Returns:
        A feature with a polygon, a fill color, an opacity of 0.75 and an rgb-string property referencing to the color.
